data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during Albrecht Beijling cruise from Panaroekan to Brouwershaven started at 1850-02-12
Ship: Albrecht Beijling, Voyage: Panaroekan - Brouwershaven, 1st Observer: K. Van de Erve (Kapitein)
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
